CustomField.description: Enter Permission set Name (Label) used to give access to Kanban dashboard. It is not mandatory, we can skip it if we want to give permission by using Public group or Queue.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter Permission set Name (Label) used to give access to Kanban dashboard. It is not mandatory, we can skip it if we want to give permission by using Public group or Queue.
CustomField.label: Permission Set
